title: Speaker for the Dead
description: In the aftermath of his terrible war, Ender Wiggin disappeared, and a powerful voice The Speaker for the Dead, who told the true story of the Bugger War.Now, long years later, a second alien race has been discovered, but again the aliens' ways are strange and frightening...again, humans die. And it is only the Speaker for the Dead, who is also Ender Wiggin the Xenocide, who has the courage to confront the mystery...and the truth.Â Speaker for the Dead is the winner of the 1986 Nebula Award for Best Novel and the 1987 Hugo Award for Best Novel.At the publisher's request, this title is being sold without Digital Rights Management software (DRM) applied.
author: Orson Scott Card
